summary: After a massive power outage, two sisters learn to survive on their own in their isolated woodland home.
cast: Elliot Page|Evan Rachel Wood|Max Minghella|Callum Keith Rennie|Michael Eklund|Wendy Crewson|Ronin Cara|Owen Cara|Crystal Pite|Lorne Cardinal|Katherine Cowie|Sandy Sidhu|Bethany Brown|Jordana Largy|Simon Longmore|Brittany Willacy
title: En el bosque
